item.title: 油轮成为最炙手可热的商品，涨幅达600%
item.description: 高昂的运输成本正成为石油生产商和炼油商的忧虑所在。【原文：High shipping costs become a cause of concern for oil producers and refiners.】

item.title: Instagram因AI购物测试引发创作者不满
item.description: 该应用的"搭配同款"功能可能影响网红与粉丝建立的信任关系【原文：The app’s Shop the Look may affect the trust influencers built with their audience】

item.title: 巴西在与特朗普的贸易对决中从大输家变身赢家
item.description: 曾面临美国最严苛进口关税的巴西，在特朗普修订后的贸易策略中获得喘息空间【原文：Once facing the harshest of the US’s import taxes, Brazil gets off easier in Trump’s revised strategy】

item.title: "Waymo化"？人工智能的承诺与风险在经济学会议上引发热议
item.description: 人工智能是本周全美商业经济协会会议讨论的焦点。【原文：Artificial intelligence was the focus for discussions at this week’s National Association for Business Economics conference.】

item.title: 特朗普称物价正在下跌。这为何会带来负面影响
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普曾多次宣称，自今年1月开启第二任期以来，美国整体物价水平已出现下降。他在2月24日的国情咨文演讲中再次重申了这一观点。但事实并非如此——当然，他也不希望事实如此。【原文：US President Donald Trump has often said that prices overall in the US have fallen since he began his second term in January, a message he repeated at his Feb. 24 State of the Union address. That’s not quite right, nor would he want it to be.】

item.title: 印度政府委员会据称将审议关键转基因食品作物的未来
item.description: 印度部长小组即将审议一种关键转基因食品作物，旨在制定政府政策——此举可能为全球最大农业市场之一向转基因品种开放铺平道路。【原文：A panel of Indian ministers is set to examine a key genetically modified food crop with a view to agreeing government policy — a potential step toward opening one of the world’s largest agricultural markets to engineered varieties.】

item.title: 世界经济论坛主席布伦德因涉埃普斯坦案辞职
item.description: 世界经济论坛首席执行官博尔格·布伦德因被曝与已定罪的恋童癖者杰弗里·爱泼斯坦存在关联，现宣布辞去职务。【原文：World Economic Forum Chief Executive Officer Borge Brende is stepping down from his position after it emerged he had ties with convicted pedophile Jeffrey Epstein.】

item.title: 克里斯比克雷姆承诺在复苏中实现更健康的资产负债表
item.description: 克里斯比克雷姆公司预计，随着其在美国结束与麦当劳公司的合作后推进转型计划，今年杠杆率将进一步下降。【原文：Krispy Kreme Inc. expects leverage to decline further this year as it advances its turnaround plan following the end of its US partnership with McDonald’s Corp.】

item.title: 比特币底层架构在抛售潮中表现稳健，令多头信心倍增
item.description:
与2022年不同，当前市场的基础设施运转良好。 

【原文：

The market’s plumbing is holding up fine, unlike in 2022. 

】

item.title: Stellantis考虑首次在欧洲采用中国电动汽车技术
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Stellantis NV正考虑引入其中国合作伙伴领航汽车的电动汽车技术，以帮助降低菲亚特、欧宝和标致等大众化欧洲品牌的成本。【原文：Stellantis NV is considering tapping electric-vehicle technology from its Chinese partner Leapmotor to help lower costs across its mass-market European brands such as Fiat, Opel and Peugeot, according to people familiar with the plans.】

item.title: 监管机构严厉打击印度巨型期权市场。成效如何？
item.description: 短短五年间，印度已从股票衍生品市场的小玩家跃升为全球最大参与者。如今，孟买每日交易的这类高投机性金融工具规模高达5.5万亿美元。【原文：In just five years, India has gone from being a small player in the market for equity derivatives to the world’s largest. Around $5.5 trillion of these highly speculative instruments are now traded in Mumbai on a daily basis.】

item.title: 先正达计划在香港进行最大规模IPO之一，市场正处于反弹期
item.description: 先正达集团在经历高调反转后，再度启动上市计划。【原文：Syngenta Group’s renewed bid to go public follows a high-profile reversal.】

item.title: Equinix与加拿大养老金计划投资委员会接近达成40亿美元收购北美数据中心公司交易
item.description: 知情人士透露，Equinix公司与加拿大养老金计划投资委员会即将达成协议，收购由Partners Group Holding AG持有的泛北欧数据中心运营商atNorth Holding AB。【原文：Equinix Inc. and Canada Pension Plan Investment Board are nearing a deal to acquire atNorth Holding AB, a pan-Nordic data center operator owned by Partners Group Holding AG, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 克劳德·科德与2026年大生产力恐慌
item.description:
人工智能编码助手曾承诺让软件开发更轻松，却意外掀起了一场不惜代价、争分夺秒的开发竞赛。

【原文：

AI coding agents promised to make software development easier. Instead they’ve kicked off a high-pressure race to build at any cost.

】

item.title: 欧洲央行创立以来最差表现，连续第三年录得年度亏损
item.description: 欧洲央行连续第三年出现年度亏损，创下有记录以来最差业绩，危机时期政策的影响仍在持续发酵。【原文：The European Central Bank reported a third straight annual loss, its worst run on record, as the effects of crisis-era policies continue to weigh.】

item.title: 拉加德去年担任欧洲央行行长期间获得近60万欧元薪酬
item.description: 克里斯蒂娜·拉加德在2025年担任欧洲央行行长期间获得59.5万欧元（约合70.183万美元）的薪酬——此外该机构还为其提供了一处住所。【原文：Christine Lagarde received compensation of €595,000 ($701,830) in 2025 as European Central Bank president — in addition to a residence provided by the institution.】

item.title: 克里斯蒂亚诺·罗纳尔多收购西班牙足球俱乐部阿尔梅里亚股份
item.description: 全球首位亿万富翁足球运动员克里斯蒂亚诺·罗纳尔多收购了西班牙足球俱乐部阿尔梅里亚25%的股份，进一步拓展了他在该领域的商业版图。【原文：Cristiano Ronaldo, the world’s first billionaire football player, bought a 25% stake in Spanish soccer club UD Almería, expanding his business interests in the sport.】

item.title: 人工智能股票波动凸显欧洲分析师与投资者分歧
item.description: 尽管市场因人工智能颠覆性影响的担忧而抛售欧洲股票，但股票分析师仍对许多欧洲股票给予了诱人的估值，这与投资者在如何评估人工智能浪潮前沿企业方面形成了鲜明对比。【原文：Equity analysts still attach attractive valuations to many European stocks at the heart of the selloff over artificial intelligence disruption fears, revealing a sharp contrast with investors over how to assess companies in the frontlines of the AI reckoning.】

item.title: 股票投资者正对下跌进行对冲。策略师们看到买入信号。
item.description: 标普500指数近四个月来始终在区间内震荡，投资者正不惜代价防范下一次大幅下跌的风险。但对越来越多策略师而言，这种悲观情绪反而预示着相反走势的可能。【原文：The S&P 500 has been stuck in a range for the better part of four months, and investors are paying up to protect against the possibility that the next big move is down. To a growing number of strategists, that pessimism is cause to expect the opposite.】

item.title: 美国关税风险促使非洲国家转向美元以外货币，埃科银行称
item.description: 泛非银行机构Ecobank Transnational Inc.负责人表示，美国动荡的关税政策正加速非洲国家减少贸易结算中美元依赖的进程，企业正探索更多使用人民币及当地货币。【原文：Volatile US tariff policy is accelerating efforts in Africa to reduce reliance on the dollar in trade settlements, with companies exploring greater use of China’s renminbi and local currencies, the head of pan-African lender Ecobank Transnational Inc. said.】

item.title: 液化石油气价格飙升，沙特阿美停产迫使油轮改道
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯一处出口终端发生停运后，亚洲液化石油气价格飙升至近一年高点，至少有一艘油轮被目击改道美国采购。【原文：Asian liquefied petroleum gas prices surged to the highest in almost a year following an outage at an export terminal in Saudi Arabia, with at least one ship seen rerouting to the US for supplies.】

item.title: NCBA认为与Nedbank的合作将扩大其在东非富裕阶层的影响力
item.description: 肯尼亚资产规模第四大银行计划借助新控股股东南非国民银行集团的资源，吸引有意在非洲大陆外增值财富的东非高净值人群。【原文：Kenya’s fourth-biggest bank by assets plans to piggyback on its new anchor shareholder Nedbank Group Ltd. to woo high-net-worth East Africans looking to grow their wealth outside the continent.】

item.title: 仲量联行称香港豪宅成交将因印花税上调放缓
item.description: 仲量联行大中华区联席行政总裁亚历克斯·巴恩斯表示，香港豪宅市场在近期印花税上调后可能趋于冷却，但下半年将出现反弹。【原文：Hong Kong’s luxury home market will likely cool off following a recent stamp duty increase before rebounding in the second half, JLL’s Greater China Co-CEO Alex Barnes said.】

item.title: 拉加德承诺欧洲央行将对人工智能引发的裁员保持"高度关注"
item.description: 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜·拉加德表示，该行将密切关注经济领域全面采用人工智能是否引发失业的任何迹象。【原文：The European Central Bank will closely monitor for any signs that the adoption of artificial intelligence throughout the economy is sparking job losses, President Christine Lagarde said.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉人对经济前景持更乐观态度，因美国干预
item.description: 随着美国放松制裁以及政府推出吸引投资的改革措施，大多数委内瑞拉人预计经济和就业市场将在六个月内好转。【原文：Most Venezuelans expect the economy and job market to improve within six months as the US eases sanctions and the government rolls out reforms to attract investment.】

item.title: 谢恩鲍姆支持率在2月民调中跌至56%的新低
item.description: 墨西哥总统克劳迪娅·谢恩鲍姆的支持率在2月份跌至56%，较1月份下降近7个百分点，创下这位左翼领导人执政以来的新低。【原文：The approval rating of Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum dipped to 56% in February, down nearly seven points since January and marking a fresh low for the leftist leader.】

item.title: Summit Partners向网络销售初创公司Stay22注资1.22亿美元
item.description: 私募股权公司Summit Partners将向蒙特利尔初创企业Stay22 Technologies Inc.投资1.22亿美元。该公司提供技术解决方案，帮助出版商和创作者通过在线销售获利。【原文：Private equity firm Summit Partners is investing $122 million in Montreal’s Stay22 Technologies Inc., a startup that offers technology to help publishers and creators earn money from online sales.】

item.title: 微软日本负责人强调配合反垄断调查
item.description: 微软日本公司负责人表示，该公司正配合日本反垄断监管机构的调查，此前微软因Azure云服务涉嫌反竞争行为而受到调查。【原文：Microsoft Corp. is compliant with Japan’s antitrust watchdog and its inquiry, the chief of its local unit said, as the company fields an investigation over possible anti-competitive practices involving the Azure cloud services.】

item.title: 标普警示印尼评级风险，数周前穆迪已发出警告
item.description: 标普全球评级警告称，不断加剧的财政压力——尤其是更高的债务偿还成本——正增加印尼主权信用状况的下行风险，可能导致评级下调。【原文：S&P Global Ratings warned that rising fiscal pressures, particularly higher debt-servicing costs, are increasing downside risks for Indonesia’s sovereign credit profile and could lead to negative rating action.】

item.title: 阿布扎比将加入新兴市场债券热潮 计划发行美元债券
item.description: 阿布扎比即将发行两笔基准规模的美元债券，这是该地区今年首次进军债务市场。【原文：Abu Dhabi is set to issue two benchmark-sized dollar bonds, in its first foray into debt markets of the year.】
